Pololu Class Reference

Class that implements the interface IPololu for a Pololu board that creates and manages serial communication object and provides basic functions for programming the controller. More...

Detailed Description

Class that implements the interface IPololu for a Pololu board that creates and manages serial communication object and provides basic functions for programming the controller.

Definition at line 13 of file Pololu.cpp.

◆ Pololu() [2/2]

Pololu::Pololu ( const char *  portName,
unsigned short  baudRate 
)

Constructor tries to open serial communication port having specified port name and baud rate. If the communication channel cannot be opened then a exception is thrown.

Parameters
portNameconst char*. Name of the communication port.
baudRateunsigned short. Baud rate parameter of serial communication port.

◆ getErrors()

unsigned short Pololu::getErrors ( )
virtual

Reads and returns all currently detected error codes.

Returns
unsigned short. Errors codes represented as bit-codes.

Implements IPololu.

Definition at line 270 of file Pololu.cpp.

◆ getMovingState()

bool Pololu::getMovingState ( )
virtual

Returns the moving state of all motors the control board is connected with. If an error occurs an exception is thrown.

Returns
bool. Return value is false if all motors don't move anymore, otherwise return value is true.

Implements IPololu.

Delivers the position value the specified motor is target at. If an error occurs an exception is thrown.

Parameters
unsignedshort servoID. ID of the servo motor.
unsignedshort tragetPos. Target position to be reached.
Returns
unsigned short is undefined.

Implements IPololu.

Definition at line 198 of file Pololu.cpp.

◆ initConnection()

void Pololu::initConnection ( const char *  portName,
unsigned short  baudRate 
)

Used to change the connection data. If the communication channel is open then the channel is closed first. The new connection parameters are set, but the channel will not be opened. To open the channel the method openConnection has to be called first.

If an error occurs an exception is thrown.

Parameters
portNameconst char*. Name of the communication port.
baudRateunsigned short. Baud rate parameter of serial communication port.

Definition at line 79 of file Pololu.cpp.

◆ openConnection()

void Pololu::openConnection ( )

Opens the serial connection with the currently specified parameter (see method initConnection(...)).

If an error occurs an exception is thrown.
